Method Detail

getAnalyzer

public org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer getAnalyzer(java.util.Locale locale)
Returns the analyzer which is either used to build, update the underlying index and to also evaluate queries on the index.

By default the Lucene standard analyzer is returned. This might be sufficient to index an English text and document pool. Nevertheless, for different languages other analyzers, e.g. org.apache.lucene.analysis.de.GermanAnalyzer, might be the better selection.

Parameters:
locale - the application locale currently in use (see Context.getApplicationLocale())
Returns:
the analyzer to be used for the underlying index
